title: spldata
text: underlying foundation spldata package strict categorization location_code granularity_geo. concept person (generally) data values location_code granularity_geo interested .

title: Authors and Citation
text: package proudly brought : Richard Aubrey White. Author, maintainer. Chi Zhang. Author. . Copyright holder. See changelog contributors. üôè

title: Authors and Citation
text: White RA, Zhang C (2022). spldata: Structural Data Norway. https://docs.sykdomspulsen./spldata/, https://github.com/sykdomspulsen-org/spldata.
code: @Manual{,   title = {spldata: Structural Data for Norway},   author = {Richard Aubrey White and Chi Zhang},   year = {2022},   note = {https://docs.sykdomspulsen.no/spldata/, https://github.com/sykdomspulsen-org/spldata}, }

title: Structural Data for Norway
text: spldata contains preformatted structural data Norway. Datasets relating population municipalities, municipality/county matching, different municipalities merged/redistricted time 2006 2020. Read introduction vignette run help(package="spldata").

title: Structural Data for Norway
text: splverse set R packages developed help solve problems frequently occur performing infectious disease surveillance. want install dev versions (access packages haven‚Äôt released CRAN), run usethis::edit_r_profile() edit .Rprofile. write : Save file restart R. can now install splverse packages drat repository.
code: options(   repos = structure(c(     SPLVERSE  = "https://docs.sykdomspulsen.no/drat/",     CRAN      = "https://cran.rstudio.com"   )) ) install.packages("splmaps")

what: Adds granularity_geo to a given data set ‚Äî add_granularity_geo_to_data_set
title: Adds granularity_geo to a given data set ‚Äî add_granularity_geo_to_data_set
text: Adds granularity_geo given data set

title: Adds granularity_geo to a given data set ‚Äî add_granularity_geo_to_data_set
Adds granularity_geo to a given data set ‚Äî add_granularity_geo_to_data_set
text: x data.table containing column called "location_code". location_reference location reference data.table.

title: Adds granularity_geo to a given data set ‚Äî add_granularity_geo_to_data_set
text: data.table containing extra column called "granularity_geo".

title: Adds granularity_geo to a given data set ‚Äî add_granularity_geo_to_data_set
code: library(data.table) data <- data.table(location_code = c("norge", "county03", "blah")) spldata::add_granularity_geo_to_data_set(data) print(data) #>    location_code granularity_geo #> 1:         norge          nation #> 2:      county03          county #> 3:          blah            blah  library(data.table) data <- data.table(location_code = c("norge", "county03", "blah")) spldata::add_granularity_geo_to_data_set(data, location_reference = spldata::nor_locations_names()) print(data) #>    location_code granularity_geo #> 1:         norge          nation #> 2:      county03          county #> 3:          blah            <NA>

title: Adds iso3 to a given data set ‚Äî add_iso3_to_data_set
code: library(data.table) data <- data.table(location_code = c("norge", "county03", "blah")) spldata::add_iso3_to_data_set(data) print(data) #>    location_code granularity_geo #> 1:         norge             nor #> 2:      county03             nor #> 3:          blah             nor

title: An environment containing configuration variables ‚Äî config
code: print(ls(spldata::config)) #> [1] "border_nor" for(i in names(spldata::config)){   cat(i, ":", spldata::config[[i]], "\n") } #> border_nor : 2020

title: All names in Norway ‚Äî nor_locations_names
text: location_code Location code. location_name Location name. location_name_description_nb Location name additional description. location_name_file_nb_utf Location name used file names, Norwegian characters. location_name_file_nb_ascii Location name used file names, without Norwegian characters. location_order preferred presentation order. granularity_geo nation, county, municip, wardoslo, wardbergen, wardstavanger, wardtrondheim, baregion, lab.

title: All redistricting in Norway ‚Äî nor_locations_redistricting
text: function returns dataset used transfer "original" datasets 2020 borders.

title: All redistricting in Norway ‚Äî nor_locations_redistricting
text: border year Norwegian geographical boundaries designated.

title: All redistricting in Norway ‚Äî nor_locations_redistricting
text: location_code_current location code per today. location_code_original location code "calyear". calyear year corresponding "county_code_original". weighting weighting needs applied. granularity_geo nation, county, municip, wardbergen, wardoslo, wardstavanger, wardtrondheim, missingwardbergen, missingwardoslo, missingwardstavanger, missingwardtrondheim, notmainlandcounty, notmainlandmunicip, missingcounty

what: Population in Norway by categories ‚Äî nor_population_by_age_cats
title: Population in Norway by categories ‚Äî nor_population_by_age_cats
text: function easily categorizes Norwegian population different age categories.

title: Population in Norway by categories ‚Äî nor_population_by_age_cats
code: nor_population_by_age_cats(   cats = NULL,   include_total = TRUE,   border = spldata::config$border_nor )

title: Population in Norway by categories ‚Äî nor_population_by_age_cats
text: cats list containing vectors want categorize. include_total Boolean. 'total' included age cat? border year Norwegian geographical boundaries designated.

title: Population in Norway by categories ‚Äî nor_population_by_age_cats
text: data.table containing following columns: granularity_geo location_code age (specified argument "cats") sex ("total") calyear pop_jan1_n imputed

title: Population in Norway by categories ‚Äî nor_population_by_age_cats
text: current year duplicated added "calyear==9999". accordance spltidy principles regarding granularity_time=="event_*".
